programme.title: New York - a melting pot?
programme.short_synopsis: How wide are the cultural divisions with New York, and do they pose a threat to the city?
programme.medium_synopsis: The cultural makeup of New York, ‘The Melting Pot’ and plays of Israel Zangwill, and the separation of Irish, Jewish, black, Italian and Puerto Rican communities in NYC.

programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
